attributes.action: Schools should close due to COVID 19.
attributes.additional_details: They are no social distancing taking place in schools and child health is more important as they can manage to learn from home.
attributes.background: Remote learning should take place as the cases increase and school teachers are not coming to school as they are ill due to COVID 19.

rejection.details:
We have published the following petitions, which you might like to sign:

Keep schools closed until May: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/573621

Close Schools and Colleges during a second nationwide lockdown: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/557012
